author: trawick
msg: apxs: Include any special APR ld flags when linking the DSO.
This resolves problems on AIX when building a DSO with apxs+gcc.

author: martin
msg: No need to treat EBCDIC differently.

author: joes
msg: Sweeping changes to implementation, just a few header tweaks tho.

author: stas
msg: remove the tab that shouldn't be there (makefile segment)

author: stas
msg: - s/should_load_module/should_skip_module/ to be consistent with a new
- add a new method config_parse_skip_module_add to extend the skip list,
in the case of mod_perl is already configured from the build and we need
to skip it when it's found in the system-wide httpd.conf
